title: Title scroll animation, rainbow Complete status, and card layout refinements

requirements.summary: Implement vertical auto-scroll animation for manga card titles that overflow their display area
acceptanceCriteria: Title scrolls vertically from bottom to top only when content overflows
Animation starts with title positioned below visible area
Title scrolls continuously upward until completely out of view at top
Animation resets and repeats from bottom after title exits top
Animation pauses on mouse hover over title
Animation resumes when mouse leaves title area
No scroll animation occurs if title fits within display area

file_operations.description: Modify the scroll animation to start from below the visible area (using negative initial position), scroll upward through the visible area, continue until completely out of view at the top, then reset to the starting position below. Update the animation keyframes and transform calculations to achieve bottom-to-top scrolling with reset. Ensure the animation only triggers when content overflows the container and maintains the existing pause-on-hover behavior.

requirements.summary: Apply rainbow gradient coloring to the 'Complete' status text when the Complete status is selected on manga cards
acceptanceCriteria: The text 'Complete' displays with rainbow gradient when status is Complete
Rainbow effect applies only to Complete status, not other statuses
Rainbow gradient is visually distinct and readable

file_operations.description: Add conditional styling to the Complete status text element to apply a rainbow gradient effect when the completed status is true. Use the existing 'rainbow' utility class from frontend/src/index.css (bg-gradient-to-r from-red-500 via-yellow-500 to-purple-500 with background-clip-text and transparent text color) or create an inline gradient. Apply this styling only when the manga entry's completed field is true, preserving the normal status styling for other states.

requirements.summary: Reposition the bookmark icon to the top right corner and the notes icon to the bottom right corner of the manga card
acceptanceCriteria: Bookmark icon is positioned at top right edge of card
Notes icon is positioned at bottom right edge of card
Icons remain accessible and clickable in their new positions
Icon positioning does not overlap or obscure other card content

file_operations.description: Update the positioning classes for the bookmark icon to place it at the top right corner of the card (using absolute positioning with top-0 right-0 or similar). Move the notes icon positioning to the bottom right corner (using absolute positioning with bottom-0 right-0 or similar). Ensure both icons remain clickable and do not overlap with other card content such as the cover image, title, or status area. Adjust z-index if necessary to maintain proper layering.

requirements.summary: Make the status area chevron and box border invisible by matching them to the background color, and move the status area upward to create space for displaying 'chapters read/available' text centered underneath it
acceptanceCriteria: Status area chevron is invisible (matches background)
Status area box border is invisible (matches background)
Status area is repositioned upward to create vertical space below
Chapters read/available text is displayed centered below the status area
Layout accommodates the new positioning without content overlap

file_operations.description: Remove or set the border color of the status area Select component to match the card background, making it invisible. Hide or remove the chevron/dropdown indicator from the status Select by setting it to transparent or removing the indicator element. Adjust the vertical positioning (margin-top or transform) of the status area to move it upward. Add a new text element below the status area displaying the chapters read/available information (using entry.chaptersRead and entry.availableChapters) with centered alignment. Ensure the new layout fits within the card without overlapping other elements like the synopsis, cover, or icons.
